description: This table stores information on record status of a questionnaire series answer.

columns.name: SERIES_ANS_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier for the questionnaire series answer record.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line number for the information associated with this record. Multiple pieces of information can be associated with this record.

columns.name: SDFL_EDIT_INST_DTTM
columns.description: Stores the instant when the record status was changed.

columns.name: SDFL_EDIT_USER_ID
columns.description: Stores the user who changed the record status.

columns.name: SDFL_EDIT_ACTION_C_NAME
columns.description:
Stores the action that was applied to the record status.


May contain organization-specific values: No
